arts.ttl: Serie A Week 36 Liveblog: Napoli vs. Genoa, Torino vs. Inter, Verona vs. Lecce
Hellas Verona vs. Lecce, a relegation battle
arts.sum: After avoiding defeat in nine successive games (W6 D3), Hellas Verona lost their last Serie A match against Lecce (0-1 in the reverse fixture) and could suffer back-to-back defeats against the Salentini for only the second time in the competition (2001). Lecce have never won against Hellas Verona in nine Serie A matches on the road (D4 L5), against no team have the Pugliesi played more away games in the competition without winning (nine also against Genoa).

Verona conceded a 1-0 defeat to Inter last weekend, but remain six points clear of the bottom three. On the other hand, Lecce also conceded a 1-0 defeat to Napoli last Saturday, but gained a point ov...
